example.name: Playback Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates how to load a playback file recorded with the realsense SDK
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Record Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates how to record realsense devices samples to a file using the realsense SDK
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Projection Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates usage of the projection interface, which defines mapping between pixel depth and realworld coordinates
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Video Module Synchronized Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates an application usage of a computer vision module, which implements a synchronous samples processing. The video module implements the video module interface, which is a common way for the application or SDK to interact with the module. It also implements a module specific interface, in this example - the module calculates the maximal depth value in the image.
example.author: Intel Corporation

example.name: Video Module Asynchronized Sample
example.description: This sample demonstrates an application usage of a computer vision module, which implements asynchronous samples processing. The video module implements the video module interface, which is a common way for the application or SDK to interact with the module. It also implements a module specific interface, in this example - the module calculates the maximal depth value in the image.
example.author: Intel Corporation
